take your pick now before we get into

emergency lighting your emergency radio

or if you wanted to double up on socks
the last thing you want to do is

having a large heavy-duty possibly

obviously if you have a chimney if you

and of course that you have an ample

Deadwood you may have a bunch of green

you're gonna asphyxiate due to carbon

water doesn't freeze as fast it will
